column4: can somebody help me with my wireless card i cant figure this out, every so often my card suddenly dies and in network manager it says its not configured, iwlist scan outputs no results and /etc/init.d/networking restart does nothing
i dont know what to do  my wireless card just suddenly dies
does dmesg | tail say anything helpful?
hmm, nothing jumps out at me... (that command should be run right after the wireless fails to get useful information btw)
